genresAdvancedInfo.name: spanish death metal
genresAdvancedInfo.description: This genre is characterized by its aggressive and intense sound, featuring heavily distorted guitars, fast tempos, and growled vocals. The lyrics often deal with themes of violence, death, and darkness. The music draws inspiration from the early pioneers of death metal, such as Death and Morbid Angel, as well as Spanish folklore and mythology. The genre has a dedicated following in Spain and Latin America.
